comment.author: 66041448@N00
comment._content: Edvard Grieg Portrait This digital painting is based on this photo uploaded by the Bergen Public Library Norway. The painting was made using Corel Paint Shop Pro, Corel Painter and a Wacom tablet with pressure sensitive stylus to hand apply the brush strokes. Appreciate the detail of the painting in the larger view at: www.flickr.com/photos/paddrick/5812548902/sizes/o/in/phot...
